name: Bepis
description:
They Never Stop Coming Kill Them Before They Kill You Parkour, Or Perish! Features:
  • Fluid Parkour Shooting Mechanics with Wallrunning
  • 3 Different Enemies with Unique Roles 
    • Running Enemy: Will Unrelentlessly Chase You and damage you by proximity
    • Flying Enemy: Will shoot in your general direction. Harmless when alone but dangerous in numbers. 
    • Grenade Enemy*: Will explode on death, killing everything in the vicinity. 
  • 3 Different Weapons Useful for Different Scenarios. Weapons have limited ammo to keep you on your toes. (Only 2 weapons in beta)
    • SMG: Jack of all trades, master of none. 
    • Shotgun: Best for dealing with ground enemies. 
    • Sniper: Best for quickly dispatching the flying enemies. 
  • Procedurally Generated Arena, so every playthrough is different
  • Constantly Escalating Difficulty 
  • Scoring System with an Online Leadeboard*
  • Perk System so the Gameplay is Never Boring*
  • Interesting Unshaded Art Style
How to Play:
  1. You are spawned in the middle of the arena. You must first find a weapon. 
  2. As long as you have ammo, shoot the enemies and don't die. 
  3. Find a different weapon when your current one is empty. 
  4. Kill a certain amount of both flying and running enemies to recieve a perk.*
  5. When you perish, and you will perish, admire your high score and compare yourself to the best*
  6. Repeat!

(*) Indicates Feature Not Yet Implemented but Coming Soon

Beta Notes and Shortcomings
  • Level Doesn't have a border yet. You can fall off. 
  • Restarting May not work properly.
  • Taller Aspect Ratios are not supported by the UI.
  • Missing Features

Trello Board To Track My Progress
